attributes.action: SAVE MONKTON CHILDRENS WARD AT MAIDSTONE HOSPITAL
attributes.additional_details:
We have already lost our Maternity services to Pembury and now they are closing this too.

This move leaves expectant mothers and now parents a trip of approx 45 minutes from Maidstone, let alone the surrounding services up country lanes to this new hopital.

For the safety of Maidstone and the surrounding areas, please help to keep this ward at Maidstone by signing the below petition.

My son may have not been so lucky if it was not for them.
